daysBetween

public static int daysBetween(Date date1,
                              Date date2)
Parameters:
date1 - The first date
date2 - The second date
Returns:
The number of days between date1 and date2. If date1 is before date2 the result will be a positive integer. If date1 is after date2 the result will be a negative integer.

Removes the time component from a date, making the time midnight.

Returns:
Input argument with hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds set to zero.

julianDayNumber

public static double julianDayNumber(Date dt)
Please note that the 4th of October, 1582 is directly followed by the 15th of October 1582 as decreed by Pope Gregor. (Pope Gregor forced this in order to achieve better agreement between the civil and the astronomical calendar)
